features: Oxford Fabric With Silver Plated Undercoating

★【Premium Material】- The Folding Chairs Storage Bags are made of high-density water-resist oxford fabric with silver plated undercoating, providing excellent dust/water /UV resistance, keeping your Folding Chairs clean.
★【Universal Size】- Folding Chairs Size: 20"L x 12"W x 39"H. Suitable for All Standard Folding Chairs (Plastic, Resin, Metal Frame Steel, and Wood Folding Chairs) Storage or Transport.

★【Reinforced Handles】- Our folding chairs cover for moving was designed with reinforced strong handles for easy to carrying. A storage bag can hold up to 4 chairs.(Tips:The handle has a certain load-bearing capacity. If it is a very heavy product, the seam of the handle is easy to tear. )

★【Easy To Use】- We provide Upright Stationary Oxford Cloth Chair Cover, Handle on one side for easy fastening/storage. A buckle at cover bottom seam for a secure fit. Transport and store 4 folding chairs
★【Easy to Clean & Storage】- Package include: 1 x Folding Chairs Cover, 1 x Storage Bag. Wipes with a damp cloth and let it dry in the sun for next use. Come with a storage bag for easy storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy storage bag for folding chairs
reviews.reviewText: This storage bag functions as described-easily covers four folding chairs for storage. The cover is well made of sturdy vinyl. Just what we needed to keep the chairs clean and ready to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Will keep them dust free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice cover for storing your folding chairs, since I store mine in the garage I wanted something to cover the chairs to prevent dust and spider webs all over the chairs. The cover is open at the bottom so I put a large garbage bag on the bottom and this cover over the top, the perfect cover would have had a closed bottom but for the prices this works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Half of buckle missing
reviews.reviewText: Cover was made well, other than the matching half of the buckle was missing. It would have been more trouble to get a refund and reorder, so I bought a buckle set to fix it. Quality control seems to be lacking a lot these days… 🙄

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I didn't know that this cover existed until I randomly came across it. It's very useful for me actually because my garage gets so dirty. This cover protects my white plastic chairs from getting dust on them, which saves me time and from getting embarrassed when it's time to quickly pull them out and offer them to guests. The handle is sturdy enough to hold/transfer the chairs from inside the house to the garage. My chairs are made of plastic, so I have no issue carrying them but you may have to watch the weight if your chair are made of steel. Overall, a great product that makes my life cleaner!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for what is intended
reviews.reviewText: This is great for covering my 4 fold up chairs. I do wish it had a better way to hold the chairs at the bottom but this is perfect to keep them covered in my shed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Better than a box
reviews.reviewText: We have a dozen standard metal folding chairs that been stored in their original, deteriorating cardboard boxes for years. This is a better cover and the handle makes them easier to carry.However, the marketing photos show this cover when full as a nice, neat package with squarish, straight lines. Its not. Its just a synthetic bag full of chairs.The buckle at the bottom holds the sides together OK but the drawstring was very difficult to tighten and leaves way too much slack.Four metal chairs really does feel like the limit without ripping the handle off. We'll have to see if this remains durable for long.
